channel.title: Nextcloud on Christos Karamolegkos
channel.description: Recent content in Nextcloud on Christos Karamolegkos

item.title: Nextcloud installation for an organization
item.description: In this article, we will present the advantages and features of the Nextcloud application suite. This article is based on the experience gained from installing Nextcloud for internal use in the Open Technologies Alliance (GFOSS).
